scripts.build:prod: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - compiles the code for production use, optimizing for performance and size
scripts.start:dev: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - starts the service in production mode
scripts.start:debug: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - starts the service with a debugger attached for debugging purposes
scripts.start:inspect: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - starts the service with the Node.js inspector attached for debugging purposes
scripts.restart: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - restarts the service on the production server
scripts.stop: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - stops the running service
scripts.test:watch: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - runs tests in watch mode for faster feedback during development
scripts.fix: npm run lint -- --fix && npm run format
scripts.clean: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - deletes any files or directories generated by previous builds/tests
scripts.prepare: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - sets up the development environment, installs dependencies, and generates any required files
scripts.deploy: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - deploys the code to a server or a cloud service
scripts.status: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - checks the status of the running service
scripts.monitor: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - monitors the health of the service and sends alerts if there are issues
scripts.logs: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - displays the logs of the running service
scripts.rollback: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - rolls back the service to a previous version in case of issues
scripts.migrate: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - performs database migrations as part of the deployment process
scripts.seed: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - seeds the database with initial data
scripts.backup: echo UNIMPLEMENTED - creates a backup of the database or the service
scripts.:postcibuild: ( [ "$(npm audit)" = 'found 0 vulnerabilities' ] && echo 'found 0 vulnerabilities' || exit 1) &&  [ "${ZE160DDEEx}" = "1050D673" ] && (coveralls < coverage/lcov.info); exit 0
